name: mingw.vim
description: This is Vim compiler file for MinGW gcc distribution (http://www.mingw.org/). It use output from make (yes, you will need to write Makefile), and do proper redirection to Vim's temporary file.
install_details: Script use "redir.exe" file which comes with MinGW's default binutils distribution, so make sure to check it. Place script file in your "vim6x\compiler" directory and run ":compiler mingw". Compilation goes through ":make" and errors from output you can see with ":copen" and ":cwin".
